findings.title: Manipulable block timestamp used for randomness
findings.explanation: The contract uses block.timestamp (now) modulo 15 to decide winners. Miners can manipulate the timestamp within ~15 seconds to force now % 15 == 0 and guarantee the jackpot.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use a secure randomness source or oracle (e.g., commit-reveal scheme, RANDAO, Chainlink VRF) instead of block timestamps for randomness.

unmatched_predictions.title: Manipulable block timestamp used for randomness
